Sodium Dodccyl Sulfate

Other Names

Foaming powder, Sodium dodecyl sulfate, Sodium dodecyl sulfate, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Sodium lauryl sulfate, Natrii laurylis sulfas

Name

Sodium dodecyl sulfate

Abbreviate

SDS

CAS No.

151-21-3

Molecular formula

ROSO3Na R=C12 alkyl

Molecular weight

288.38 (R= C12alkyl)

Grade
